attributes.action: Maintain State ownership of the banks
attributes.additional_details:
The government should not sell off their investments in the banks (e.g. Llyodys TSB) and should do the opposite, increase their investments in the banking system so that one day we will have state owner ship of the banks. Capitalism works but privatisation of the banks means that the debt holders of the world are private groups and individuals when it should be the people.

We need Socialist banking with a Capitalist economy.
